# Solid

## Docs

- [Controls](https://docs.solidfi.com/accounts/controls.md): A guide to Account Controls
- [Introduction](https://docs.solidfi.com/accounts/introduction.md): An introduction to Accounts
- [Master Accounts](https://docs.solidfi.com/accounts/master-accounts.md): A guide to Master Accounts
- [Reconciliation](https://docs.solidfi.com/accounts/reconciliation.md): A guide to Reconciliation
- [Sub Accounts](https://docs.solidfi.com/accounts/sub-accounts.md): A guide to Sub Accounts
- [ATM](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/atm.md): A guide to Automated Teller Machines (ATM).
- [Controls](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/controls.md): A guide to Cards Issuance Controls.
- [Introduction](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/introduction.md): An introduction to Card Issuance.
- [Physical Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/physical-card.md): A guide to Physical Cards
- [Virtual Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/virtual-card.md): A guide to Virtual Cards.
- [Wallet](https://docs.solidfi.com/card-issuance/wallet.md): A guide to Wallets.
- [Account Holders](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/account-holders.md): A guide to Account Holders
- [Card Holders](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/card-holders.md): A guide to Card Holders
- [Counterparties](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/counterparties.md): A guide to Counterparties
- [Flow of Funds](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/flow-of-funds.md): A guide to Flow of Funds
- [Introduction](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/introduction.md): Learn about the Solid Platform
- [Transactions](https://docs.solidfi.com/general/transactions.md): A guide to Transactions
- [ACH](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/ach.md): A guide to ACH
- [Check](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/check.md): A guide to Checks
- [Controls](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/controls.md): A guide to Payment Controls
- [Intra Account](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/intra-account.md): A guide to Intra Account (On-Us)
- [Introduction](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/introduction.md): An introduction to Payments
- [Wire](https://docs.solidfi.com/payments/wire.md): A guide to Wires
- [Create an Attachment](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/attachments/create-an-attachment.md): Create an Attachment
- [Delete an Attachment](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/attachments/delete-an-attachment.md): Delete an Attachment
- [List all Attachments](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/attachments/list-all-attachments.md): List all Attachments
- [Retrieve an Attachment](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/attachments/retrieve-an-attachment.md): Retrieve an Attachment
- [Create a Card Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/card-holders/create-a-card-holder.md): Create a Card Holder
- [List all Card Holders](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/card-holders/list-all-card-holders.md): List all Card Holders
- [Retrieve a Card Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/card-holders/retrieve-a-card-holder.md): Retrieve a Card Holder
- [Update a Card Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/card-holders/update-a-card-holder.md): Update a Card Holder
- [Activate a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/activate-a-card.md): Activate a Card
- [Create a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/create-a-card.md): Create a Card
- [List all Cards](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/list-all-cards.md): List all Cards
- [Provision a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/provision-a-card.md): Provision a Card on Apple Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay
- [Reissue a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/reissue-a-card.md): Reissue a Card
- [Retrieve a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/retrieve-a-card.md): Retrieve a Card
- [Set a PIN](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/set-a-pin.md): Setting a PIN is a two-step process 
 1. Get a one-time PIN token 
 2. Use the PIN token in Solid's SDK to set a PIN. Solid will provide access to the SDK during the implementation.
- [Show a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/show-a-card.md): Displaying unredacted card number and CVV is a two-step process 
 1. Get a one-time show token 
 2. Use the show token in Solid's SDK to show the unredacted card number and CVV. Solid will provide access to the SDK during the implementation.
- [Update a Card](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/cards/update-a-card.md): Update a Card
- [Create a Counterparty](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/counterparties/create-a-counterparty.md): Create a Counterparty
- [List all Counterparties](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/counterparties/list-all-counterparties.md): List all Counterparties
- [Retrieve a Counterparty](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/counterparties/retrieve-a-counterparty.md): Retrieve a Counterparty
- [Retrieve Bank Info](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/counterparties/retrieve-bank-info.md): Retrieve Bank Info
- [Update a Counterparty](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/counterparties/update-a-counterparty.md): Update a Counterparty
- [Attachments](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/attachments.md): Solid Platform supports attachments
- [Authentication](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/authentication.md): API key based authentication
- [Environments](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/environments.md): Sandbox and Prod environments
- [Idempotency](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/idempotency.md): Solid Platform supports idempotency
- [Introduction](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/introduction.md): An introduction to the Solid APIs
- [Metadata](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/metadata.md): Solid Platform supports metadata
- [Pagination](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/pagination.md): Solid Platform support cursor pagination
- [Rate Limiting](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/rate-limiting.md): Solid Platform enforces rate limiting
- [Simulation](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/getting-started/simulation.md): Solid Platform simulates transactions
- [List all Master Accounts](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/master-accounts/list-all-master-accounts.md): List all Master Accounts
- [Retrieve a Master Account](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/master-accounts/retrieve-a-master-account.md): Retrieve a Master Account
- [Simulate an Auth Transaction](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/simulation/simulate-an-auth-transaction.md): Simulate an Auth Transaction
- [Simulate an Incoming ACH Pull](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/simulation/simulate-an-incoming-ach-pull.md): Simulate an Incoming ACH Pull
- [Simulate an Incoming ACH Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/simulation/simulate-an-incoming-ach-push.md): Simulate an Incoming ACH Push
- [Simulate an Incoming Domestic Wire Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/simulation/simulate-an-incoming-domestic-wire-push.md): Simulate an Incoming Domestic Wire Push
- [Simulate an Incoming International Wire Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/simulation/simulate-an-incoming-international-wire-push.md): Simulate an Incoming International Wire Push
- [Create a Sub Account Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/create-a-sub-account-holder.md): Create a Sub Account Holder
- [List all Sub Account Holders](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/list-all-sub-account-holders.md): List all Sub Account Holders
- [Retrieve a Sub Account Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/retrieve-a-sub-account-holder.md): Retrieve a Sub Account Holder
- [Submit an IDV](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/submit-a-idv.md): Submit an IDV
- [Submit a KYB](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/submit-a-kyb.md): Submit a KYB
- [Submit a KYC](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/submit-a-kyc.md): Submit a KYC
- [Update a Sub Account Holder](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-account-holders/update-a-sub-account-holder.md): Update a Sub Account Holder
- [Create a Sub Account](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-accounts/create-a-sub-account.md): Create a Sub Account
- [List all Sub Accounts](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-accounts/list-all-sub-accounts.md): List all Sub Accounts
- [Retrieve a Sub Account](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-accounts/retrieve-a-sub-account.md): Retrieve a Sub Account
- [Update a Sub Account](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/sub-accounts/update-a-sub-account.md): Update a Sub Account
- [List all Transactions](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/list-all-transactions.md): List all Transactions
- [Originate a Check Deposit](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-check-deposit.md): Originate a Check Deposit
- [Originate a Check Send](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-check-send.md): Originate a Check Send
- [Originate a Debit Card Pull](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-debit-card-pull.md): Originate a Debit Card Pull
- [Originate a Debit Card Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-debit-card-push.md): Originate a Debit Card Push
- [Originate a Domestic Wire](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-domestic-wire.md): Originate a Domestic Wire
- [Originate a FedNow Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-a-fednow-push.md): Originate a FedNow Push
- [Originate an ACH Pull](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-ach-pull.md): Originate an ACH Pull
- [Originate an ACH Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-ach-push.md): Originate an ACH Push
- [Originate an International Wire](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-international-wire.md): Originate an International Wire
- [Originate an Intra Account Pull](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-intra-account-pull.md): Originate an Intra Account Pull
- [Originate an Intra Account Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-intra-account-push.md): Originate an Intra Account Push
- [Originate an RTP Push](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/originate-an-rtp-push.md): Originate an RTP Push
- [Retrieve a Transaction](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/retrieve-a-transaction.md): Retrieve a Transaction
- [Sub Ledger a Transaction](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/transactions/sub-ledger-a-transaction.md): Sub Ledger a Transaction

- [Delete a Webhook](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/webhooks/delete-a-webhook.md): Delete a Webhook

- [Retrieve a Webhook](https://docs.solidfi.com/v2/api-reference/webhooks/retrieve-a-webhook.md): Retrieve a Webhook
